name: Morning Meditation
description: Start your day with a peaceful and focused mind through this morning meditation. Allow yourself to let go of stress and set positive intentions for the day ahead.

name: Deep Relaxation
description: Indulge in deep relaxation as you release tension from your body and mind. This meditation is designed to help you achieve a state of profound calm and tranquility.

name: Mindful Breathing
description: Connect with your breath and bring your awareness to the present moment. This guided meditation will help you cultivate mindfulness and find inner peace through focused breathing techniques.

name: Body-Scan Meditation
description: Bring attention to different parts of your body and observe sensations, promoting deep relaxation and body awareness. This meditation cultivates a sense of connection between the mind and body.

name: Stress Relief
description: Release stress and tension with this calming meditation. Allow yourself to unwind, relax, and restore balance to your mind and body.
